WorkItem.Description:
Even if I load a brand new toon from armory, then try to save, rawr gives an unhandled exception error and crashes. Here is the detail log.
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.InvalidOperationException: There was an error generating the XML document. ---> System.InvalidOperationException: The type Rawr.DoT was not expected. Use the XmlInclude or SoapInclude attribute to specify types that are not known statically.

WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Crash when trying to Save File

Comments.Message:
I've had this problem as well, thought I'd downloaded a trojan with the latest version of rawr.

Basically from what I can gather it corrupts the security.config.cch file in Microsoft.NET folder

pathway:
Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework/v2.0.50727\CONFIG\security.config.cch

Not sure what to do about it.

Any suggestions?

I have tried deleting this file in safe mode ... then had an error with mscorlib.dll file
